title: can't join LOL PBE
body:
When ever I go to this page
https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe
and I click on ( I want to help )  it shows me this message
http://i.imgur.com/CnMwx1n.jpg

replies.body: It looks like you are attempting to sign up for the PBE via the NA region URL, but need to use the one for EUNE.  You'll need to sign in from the EUNE page first, then visit the PBE link.  So, log out first then head over to the EUNE page.  Once there, the [EUNE PBE](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) link should get this resolved.  Hope that helps!
